# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)
project(OpenGL-Training LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_executable(OpenGL-Training "")
set_target_properties(OpenGL-Training PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "OpenGL-Training")
set_target_properties(OpenGL-Training PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    C:/Users/vince/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.4/b28486932c4340c9b8517e00cf266130/include
    C:/Users/vince/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.34/2cb082a712a04167aa58cc4c948cbd67/include
    C:/Users/vince/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glm/0.9.9+8/8335bab7c0314ab9921440de58961aac/include
    C:/Users/vince/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/s/stb/0.0/86911977ee9f47b7ac1685c567fd7b8b/include
)
target_compile_definitions(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
set_property(TARGET OpenGL-Training PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
target_compile_features(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
target_link_libraries(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    glfw3
    opengl32
    glad
    user32
    shell32
    gdi32
)
target_link_directories(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    C:/Users/vince/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.4/b28486932c4340c9b8517e00cf266130/lib
    C:/Users/vince/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.34/2cb082a712a04167aa58cc4c948cbd67/lib
)
target_sources(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
    src/Shader.cpp
    src/Texture.cpp
)
